DOC.brief_summary: This one week study design test safety personal lubricant in-home use subject perceive sensitive skin .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Sensitive Sensual Touch Personal Lubricant
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , medically supervise , single-arm study evaluate safety 2-in-1 sensual touch lotion personal lubricant product home-use condition via clinical assessment . The study consist two visit . Subjects meet entrance criterion receive investigational product ( IP ) four subjective questionnaire at-home completion . The subject require use IP least two time application site , instructed 1-week home-use period . At end study ( Visit 2 ) subject return study site , time unused IP questionnaire return final clinical assessment perform .
DOC.criteria: Normal , healthy adult stable , monogamous , ongoing heterosexual relationship current partner least 6 month Subjects comfortable discuss sensitive topic personal hygiene , menstruation sexuality At least one partner couple sensitive skin per protocoldefined criterion Able read understand English Voluntarily sign Informed Consent document trial explain Willing follow study procedure , include birth control requirement Any medical mental health history condition , use product , drug medication per protocol ( opinion Investigator ) might compromise participant 's safety analysis result Participation research subject within timeline dictate protocol Participants relationships employment outside protocoldefined parameter
